## IInputSpec interface

Specifies input to the [plot()](./plot.plot.md) function.

Add your named data series as fields in this object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IInputSpec 
```

## Example

<pre>

{ A: \[10, 30, 15, 45\], B: \[50, 45, 60, 65\] }
